name: Modified 2D Platformer
description:
This is my Modified 2D Platformer Project.

Modifications:

1) Created a complete, interesting, comprehensive level with a connecting storyline.

2) Replaced all of the sound effects of the game with custom music made in Garage Band. 

3) Added a differently colored enemy that will chase players within a certain range. 

Credits:

Created by Ava Sheridan
